title: murugA urutuNai puriya
sahitya:
murugA urutuNai puriya nI varuvAi tiruvEragam uraiyum dIna dayALanE


anupallavi

  parivODu bhaktaraip-pAlikkum perumAnE karuNaiyODu ennaiyum kAttaruLa vENum


caraNam    unaiyanri evaraiyA enai AtkoNDu aNaiyum tuNaiyAga AdaravaLippAr
tinai aLavEnumE unaduLLam uDanE kanindAl pOdumen kali tIrndu viDumE
